extendedInfo.description: The only App that sends you massively discounted deals tailored to you and available for instant use wherever you go. Deals, offering 50 to 90% savings on restaurants, spas, entertainment, and moreâ¦ are delivered to you where you want them, when you need them. Stop missing out on the big discounts. Our smart DealMatchâ¢ technology will deliver to you the deals you'll love to hear about. Like the deal? Buy it on the spot and redeem it immediately. Use the map tool to guide you to the store and redeem your paperless voucher from your phone. Â· Wherever you are; at work, home or on the go, DealSquare's mobile marketplace will help you buy, sell, share, and manage all your purchased deals.Â· Bought a Groupon, LivingSocial or other deal you won't get to use? Sell them easily on our marketplace. Maybe even make a profit. Â· Download and join DealSquare's mobile market square to receive alerts on deals tailored to you. Discover, buy, share, sell and track the best deals in town where you are, directly from your mobileFeatures:* Smart Deal alerts carefully selected for you.* Browse live deals from over 500 providers nationwide. * Buy or Share the deal you like easily and quickly.* Sell a deal that you can't use, or let Dealsquare do it for you.* Easily import all your daily deals into your Deals Dashboard. * Manage all your deals from your dashboard.* Easily redeem them, post for sale, set reminders or mark as used.DealSquare can help you find any daily deal in town from pizza to HDTV, from spa, travel and vacation deals to electronics computers. Get the best and hottest deals right to your phone, available for instant redemption at a store nearby.

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.comment: Other Apps offer the same deals and many many more. This is just a downgraded version of the others & a waste of memory. Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great deals
reviews.comment: I\'m always looking for deals, and this app leaves some incredible ones. Definitely worth a look.
reviews.author: A Google User
